articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Detect the expected and discover the unexpected
articles.contents:
This website is part of SMU
MITB course - Visual Analytics & Applications.
It is designed to explore visual representation of business data
interactively.

articles.title: Visual Analytics
articles.description: Welcome to my website. I hope you enjoy it!
articles.contents:
You will see how visual analytics techniques can be used to interact
with data from various sources and formats.
